body_content.explanation: to improve the quality of something by adding something else:
examples: Fertilizer helps to enrich the soil.
My life was greatly enriched by knowing her.

body_content.explanation: to make something or someone richer:
examples: He claimed that the large stores were enriching themselves at the expense of their customers.

body_content.explanation: to increase the level of a particular isotope (= one form of an atom) in an element in order to make it more powerful or make it explode more powerfully:
examples: The country disclosed in 1984 that it could enrich uranium for nuclear weapons.
